CWEs: CWE-404: Improper Resource Shutdown or Release
description: The function 'unique_name_566' is vulnerable to several issues. Firstly, it does not control the size of the file being downloaded, which can lead to resource exhaustion (CWE-400). Secondly, it does not properly handle errors that may occur during the download process, which can lead to resources not being properly released (CWE-404). Lastly, the function is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks because it does not validate the URL from which it downloads files (CWE-918).
